title: junit output breaks if there are non-ascii characters in the build output
body:
When installing a package and using `--log-format=junit`, if the output includes non-ascii characters, the `spack install` command returns an error and an empty output file is created. The package is still correctly installed.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack install  --log-file=cairo.xml --log-format=junit  cairo@1.16.0%intel@18.0.5~X+pdf ^freetype@2.7.1
```
Note the `^freetype@2.7.1` dependency is specified because it's the one I found which builds cleanly with `%intel`. `cairo%intel` is the only package I found until now that produces non-ascii characters in the output.

### Error Message
```console
$ spack --debug --stacktrace install  --log-file=cairo.xml --log-format=junit  cairo@1.16.0%intel@18.0.5~X+pdf ^freetype@2.7.1
(...)
lib/spack/spack/package.py:1641 ==> [2019-08-13-16:11:19.703082] Successfully installed cairo
  Fetch: 0.13s.  Build: 1m 5.40s.  Total: 1m 5.53s.
[+] /home/user/spackdev/upstream.spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/intel-18.0.5/cairo-1.16.0-r473cvuiopupbr2ozixc44fnenx2lfho
(...)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/user/spackdev/upstream.spack/bin/spack", line 48, in <module>
    sys.exit(spack.main.main())
  File "/home/user/spackdev/upstream.spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 697, in main
    return _invoke_command(command, parser, args, unknown)
  File "/home/user/spackdev/upstream.spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 447, in _invoke_command
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/home/user/spackdev/upstream.spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 331, in install
    install_spec(args, kwargs, abstract, concrete)
  File "/home/user/spackdev/upstream.spack/lib/spack/spack/report.py", line 265, in __exit__
    self.report_writer.build_report(self.filename, report_data)
  File "/home/user/spackdev/upstream.spack/lib/spack/spack/reporters/junit.py", line 29, in build_report
    f.write(t.render(report_data))
UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character u'\u03bc' in position 548590: ordinal not in range(128)
$ echo $?
1
$ grep μ /home/user/spackdev/upstream.spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/intel-18.0.5/cairo-1.16.0-r473cvuiopupbr2ozixc44fnenx2lfho/.spack/spack-build-out.txt 
      status = get_glyph (ctx, scaled_font, "μ", &glyphs[i]);
$ ls -l cairo.xml 
-rw-r--r-- 1 user group 0 Aug 13 16:11 cairo.xml
```

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. Linux, RedHat Linux 7.6
 2. spack @ https://github.com/spack/spack/commit/bb6ec7fb40c14b37e094a860e3625af53f633174 (develop)
 3. manually installed intel compiler:
```
$ spack config --scope user get compilers
...
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: rhel7
    paths:
      cc: /ssoft/spack/external/intel/2018.4/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/bin/intel64/icc
      cxx: /ssoft/spack/external/intel/2018.4/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/bin/intel64/icpc
      f77: /ssoft/spack/external/intel/2018.4/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
      fc: /ssoft/spack/external/intel/2018.4/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
    spec: intel@18.0.5
    target: x86_64
```
